title: Comfortable, well located hotel
text:
I've always found the Ibis group to offer a comfortable bed, nice selection of food for breakfast, and for a reasonable price. They do appear to be upgrading the bedrooms and gone is the bathroom 'pod' which I was quite fond of.
I don't like the removal of the check-in desk to be replaced by roving receptionists who attack you on entering the hotel. After a tedious journey I often like to sit down for a rest and a little refreshment before the actual check-in.
Apart from these minor annoyances I am happy to recommend.
A little warning, make sure you book on company's site, as this is where you get best rate. I was hi-jacked to another booking company and had to pay for breakfast, which I thought I had included in my booking.
